about_the_game:
A rag-tag group of animals makes it their mission to steal from the rich to give to the poor - and it's up to you to plan the heist! Become the leader of the Plunder Pack, research your targets, build gadgets, and make sure your team makes it home safe in this stealth/strategy game. Maybe you'll find both friendship and betrayal along the way.

Features

  • Help the poor & steal from those who wronged them
  • Plan your heist by researching your targets
  • Get to know your gang of thieves through their backstories
  • Open up new ways of stealing by buying gadgets & recruiting new members
  • Break into casinos, museums & mansions as you expose conspiracies across the city
  • Play the way you prefer - from quick & intense to slow & strategic

Be prepared!

Pick a team of thieves with different abilities and choose the gadgets to help you. Will you enter through the basement? Will you bring a drill to break through a wall or have you sent an undercover scout to figure out the secret combination for the backdoor?


The pack works together

Things don’t always go as planned! Pause the game at any time to give new orders to your crew. Create distractions with a stereo to save a cornered thief from being caught, cut the power at the right moment to allow another to pass the security lasers - or even let yourself get spotted to lead the guards on a wild goose chase!
